amendment.description: To modify a provision relating to Harbor Maintenance Trust Fund prioritization.

vote.text: Amendment SA 870 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 870 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Wyden.
